as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

initialValues.description: The initial values of the form

initialErrors.description: The initial errors of the form

initialTouched.description: The initial touched fields of the form

validateOnMount.description: Whether to validate the form on mount
validateOnMount.description_zh: 是否在挂载时验证表单

onSubmit.description: The function to call when the form is submitted
onSubmit.description_zh: 表单提交时调用的函数

onInvalidSubmit.description: The function to call when the form submission is invalid
onInvalidSubmit.description_zh: 表单提交无效时调用的函数

keepValues.description: Whether to keep the form values after submission
keepValues.description_zh: 是否在提交后保留表单值
